multiTarget.title: Multi-Optimization Target Config
multiTarget.info1: Note: Community-created Multi-Optimization Targets can be found within the <1>GO Discord</1> or <3>KQM's Multi-Optimization Guide</3>, however, the validity of such configurations cannot be guaranteed.
multiTarget.info2: It is the responsibility of the user to make sure configs accurately represent their use case.

addStats.title: Параметры Врага + Бонусы
addStats.info: You can use these fields to add buffs/debuffs not directly supported in GO, such as food buffs, Abyss cards, or Superconduct. Please refer to the <1>Genshin Impact Wiki</1> for specific values.

tabTheorycraft.maxRolls: Эта доп. хар-ка может содержать максимум 30 Роллов.
tabTheorycraft.maxRollsMain: Because at least one main stat has the same attribute, this substat can have a maximum of {{value}} rolls.

tabTeambuff.resonance_tip: Отряд должен состоять из 4 персонажей, чтобы элементарный резонанс вступил в силу.
